title: So Mid Lane Malzahar has been officially destroyed
body:
Because his kit was toxic in duo bot lane. Got it.

- No more voidling blocking, one of the last remaining Malz mechanics that actually required skill and creativity. It was completely balanced in solo lane because it came at the cost of lane pressure.
- Voidling spawn delay, screwing up with the very tight 3-second window Malz has to grow his army and, you know, have any lane pressure at all.
- 1 second cooldown inbetween voidling casts, which coupled with the change above, will pretty much destroy his combo. So we have a ramp champion that can't ramp anymore because the opponent has now a looooong window to run away from him now.

You would think that nerfs to Malz support would have some compensation buffs for solo lane Malz. Maybe having his voidlings have less base damage and more scaling damage, so that, you know, mid laners who actually have gold and buy damage would make proper use of them, while supports who can instant kill at level 2 wouldn't be able to do so anymore? But nope.

The official patch notes literally said: "hey guys, we know those things are important to mid laners, but we only care about balancing him as a supporter now".

And I know that Malz isn't the virst victim of this balance "philosophy", but simply one more champion to add to the list of mid laner mages that are stuck at bot lane now.

I actually enjoy his rework, as long as I can (could) play it as the carry mage he's meant to be and not as a high-damage support. What I despise is that this last balance patch literally and officially tells us "we know this stuff is important to mid laners, but we're balancing him as a support champion now".

yeah you see, that's not what they intend to do, they're gonna kalista or yorick him.

The only rework i consider to be a success is taric, everything else has spiraled out of control and has been nerfed into obscurity, never got liftoff, or has been a recurring problem. 

There are other reworks that came out pretty decent, but then in exchange they destroyed the core of the champion. 

and then theres the quarterly ryze rework.
Do you know what "Yorick" means? It means to basically remove a champion from the game. Same thing with "Sion" or "Poppy". The only VGU that hasn't removed something from the game is Warwick's.
All 3 of those updates are great. In fact, Poppy is overtuned. Sure they changed identities, but that's because their old identities were toxic for the game.
Every VGU has turned out great lmao.. not just Tarics.

I beg to differ with yorick, it really removed his entire flavor as a champion and turned him into "THE EDGEMASTER OF EDGELAND!" 

he was literally a completely different champion, now he's like a Mcfarlane comic with a different playstyle and kit... but he's got the same name

Also shen? look at what they did to him. it took a bit but they had to nerf him into the ground for a good chunk of players.. he still lingers but he's like a toothless guard dog.

Yorick's old state wasn't healthy at alll. This new iteration has him healthy and now he can go back on the rotation, get skins, and can be balanced. The old Yorick was toxic as heck.

Shen wasn't a VGU. He wasn't well received, hence them switching to the VGU format.

His new iteration is only healthy for people he is going against. He has one real damage ability, and his kit is based around split pushing, while most champs that aren't can do it better (I can out split push a Yorick as Rumble so....)

People just didn't like going against him before, and I get that, but he went from not fun to play against to really not fun to play as. I'm not sure that is a trade off that seems worth making.
His E does damage and his R does damage as well. Anything that does damage is a "real damage ability" and I find new Yorick loads of fun to play.

1 second cooldown between voidlings.

Goodbye Malzahar, Riot just completely destroyed your ability to be a mage with absolutely zero compensation buffs at all.

Yeah, I get it, level 2 all-ins were a bit too strong, but now they have completely destroyed Malzahar's ability to combo past 6.  You have to spawn a voidling, wait a _full second_ (which is honestly a very long time), then spawn a second one, and then you can combo and ult.  In the meantime your opponent has simply walked away from the voidling, and the new range slowdown means the voidling isn't going to keep up at all.
Just revert the rework please, that's the entire reason Malz is in bot is because he's getting fucked up mid by 80% of the champ he's facing
REVERT THE REWORK OR RITO SwiftRage
